li.p: To indicate that the selected document portion should be added click Redlining Redline As Inserted... An Redline As Inserted Dialog will show up, where user may type the annotation.
The portion will be marked green and underlined.
To indicate that the selected document portion should be removed click Redlining Redline As Deleted... An Redline As Deleted Dialog will show up, where user may type the comment for the redlining.
The portion will be marked red and strike-through.
To comment the selected document portion click Redlining Redline As Commented... An Redline As Commented Dialog will show up, where user may type the comment.
The selected portion will be marked with yellow.

note.p: If you usually do not need to annotate the redlining, unset Redlining Ask for Annotation .
